description:
This EPD is conducted for representative products derived from Quiet-Tech’s line of products
 produced at the facility located in Irvington, New Jersey. Quiet-Tech’s insulation primarily
 consists of recycled carpet and recycled clothing. There are several advantages to Quiet-Tech
 insulation. It is an acoustic batt insulation that offers soundproofing capabilities to help reduce
 sound transmission between walls and is effective for sound dampening rooms. The UNSPSC
 code for this insulation product is 30141508 and the CSI code is 07 21 O00. The results in this
 EPD arevalid for all Quiet-Tech products manufactured at the company’s Irvington, New Jersey
 facility.
name: Acoustic Batt Insulation
